title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 03 March 2015 - XWiki
content:
<vmassol> so you should be able to use any of htese  
00:00 <vmassol> maybe more but those exist at least  
00:02 <vmassol> some examples here too: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Solr+Search+Query+API  
00:02 <vmassol> ok found an interesting doc for you: http://design.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/SolrSchema  
00:02 <debajit> that worked. Thank you so much  
00:05 <vmassol> seems marius forgot to move that design doc to the doc, he added some info in the release notes though: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki53RC1#HSearchforDocumentsMatchingSpecificValuesinMultipleXObjectProperties  
00:06 <vmassol> (that's if you need to search on xobject/xproperties)  
00:08 <debajit> the links are really useful. Thank you very much  
00:08 <vmassol> np  
00:13 <vmassol> gtg, nn  
00:14 <vmassol> has quit  
00:47 <debajit123> has joined #xwiki  
00:50 <debajit> has left #xwiki  
00:50 <debajit123> is now known as <debajit>  
06:29 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
06:49 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:09 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:26 <gsmeria> has quit  
07:29 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:17 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:18 <cjd> has quit  
08:20 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:23 <Bugendolf> has quit  
08:28 <Bugendolf> has joined #xwiki  
08:43 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
08:55 <gsmeria> has quit  
08:58 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <mflorea> Good morning. I'm checking the remaining failing tests (extension + wysiwyg)  
09:40 <OSIMasson> has left #xwiki  
09:49 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:23 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
10:24 <vmassol> good morning  
11:06 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:42 <vmassol> mflorea: question for you  
11:42 <vmassol> if you go on http://playground.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Search?sort=score&sortOrder=desc&r=1&f\_type=DOCUMENT&f\_locale=en&f\_locale=&text=test  
11:42 <vmassol> you should see 3 results displayed  
11:43 <mflorea> ok  
11:43 <vmassol> I have 2 questions actually  
11:43 <vmassol> 1) if I click on the RSS feed link I get only 2 results in the feed  
11:44 <vmassol> 2) the search page shows 3 results but says 1-10 of 16  
11:46 <tmortagne> note: xwiki.org is 6.2.2 so maybe there has been bugfixes since  
11:49 <tmortagne>   p, li { white-space: pre-wrap; }  [WARN] Upgrading myxwiki.org to 6.4.2 in about 1h  
11:49 <vmassol> nice  
11:53 <mflorea> vmassol: re 1) there's nothing special about rss, you get the same if you sort by last modification date. As for why it happens, I suspect solr caches, but I can't tell for sure without investigating.  
11:56 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:57 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
13:56 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
14:18 <tmortagne> [WARN] Moving myxwiki.org on 6.4.2 in 10 minutes  
14:24 <lucaa> has quit  
14:30 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:37 <lucaa> has quit  
15:05 <msmeria> has quit  
15:05 <carlez> has joined #xwiki  
15:10 <carlez> Hi! I'm trying to display an object using classsheetbinding but I have a problem with the object page title. In the sheet page I write $doc.setTitle() but it doesn't change title in the object page. How can I do it?  
15:11 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
15:18 <gsmeria> has quit  
15:19 <gsmeria> has quit  
15:19 <lucaa> has quit  
15:20 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
15:29 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
15:29 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
15:35 <tmortagne> Pbas: looks like it was restarting, works now  
15:35 <Pbas> Yes Mister Skol goes away :-) Thxs  
15:47 <mflorea> vmassol: looks like this is a flicker http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-mail-test-tests/976/testReport/junit/org.xwiki.mail.test.ui/MailTest/testMail/ maybe you can take a look  
15:58 <vmassol> mflorea: checking  
16:03 <mflorea> Enygma`, tmortagne: can you move the issues that are assigned to you from 7.0M2 to RC1 so that I know what's left for M2. Thanks  
16:03 <mflorea> http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=Project%20in%20%28%22XWiki%20Commons%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Rendering%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Platform%22%2C%20%22XWiki%20Enterprise%22%29%20and%20fixVersion%20in%20%28%227.0-milestone-2%22%29%20and%20resolution%20in%20%28%22Unresolved%22%29  
16:06 <tmortagne> mflorea: done  
16:06 <mflorea> thanks  
16:06 <Enygma`> mflorea: done  
16:08 <mflorea> thanks, I'll move XWIKI-10446 to RC1, although I don't think anyone is working on it.  
16:09 <vmassol> mflorea: have you seen this MailTest error before? First time I see it and right now I can't find the reason by looking at the test  
16:09 <vmassol> (I'll continue looking)  
16:10 <mflorea> I haven't seen it failing before, but it failed once and then passed so I'm pretty sure it's a flicker  
16:10 <mflorea> failed in #976 and passed in #977  
16:11 <vmassol> yes seen that  
16:11 <tmortagne> mflorea: you should probably remove the fix for since nobody is assigned on it  
16:11 <mflorea> maybe it's some rare condition  
16:11 <mflorea> we'll see if it fails again  
16:11 <tmortagne> talking about XWIKI-10446)  
16:11 <vmassol> tmortagne: if we think it's an important bug we need to fix it asap  
16:12 <vmassol> if we don't think it's an important bug then I agree we should remove the fix fox  
16:12 <vmassol> \*for  
16:12 <mflorea> we moved it a couple of time already  
16:12 <vmassol> yes but that doesn't make it not important  
16:12 <vmassol> and it forces us to think about it every time  
16:12 <vmassol> which is a good thing if we think it's important  
16:12 <evalica> the bug is important, but from what I understood the fix is not that easy, since it needs signed script or something  
16:13 <vmassol> signed script is the ideal fix  
16:13 <vmassol> but I'm pretty sure there are other solutiosn  
16:13 <mflorea> sure, it just shows that no one is willing to loot at it, or no one has time :(  
16:13 <tmortagne> it mostly force us to move it every time, more than thinking about it  
16:13 <vmassol> we've not waited for signed scripts for al ot of other stuff and we've found workaournds  
16:13 <vmassol> what are we doing now tmortagne? :)  
16:13 <tmortagne> vmassol: discussing if we should keep moving it, I don't see any suggestion to fix it  
16:15 <vmassol> what?  
16:15 <vmassol> I've listed at least 3 qsuggestions in the issue  
16:16 <vmassol> do we know what's requiring the PR?  
16:16 <vmassol> and they don't loook hard at all  
16:16 <vmassol> I'd say it's a 3 hours fix  
16:16 <vmassol> but first we need to identify what's requoriung the PR  
16:26 <vmassol> mflorea, tmortagne: seems it's fixed :)  
16:27 <mflorea> :)  
16:27 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: could you tell us if some user is used now for the wiki provisioning?  
16:27 <vmassol> like running with a user having PR under the hood  
16:27 <gdelhumeau> when we install a subwiki with the default UI, superadmin is used  
16:28 <vmassol> ok so that explains it...  
16:28 <vmassol> you know the jira issue for this ?  
16:28 <gdelhumeau> but it is not the case when we create a wiki from a template  
16:28 <carlez> has quit  
16:28 <vmassol> ah I only tested without a template  
16:28 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: no sorry. I first did that for the Wiki Flavor Application, and I let it like this when I did the integration in platform  
16:29 <vmassol> tmortagne said: "Note that you probably don't have the issue if you create the wiki from a template instead of creating it empty."  
16:29 <vmassol> will test with a template now  
16:29 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: what's the issue where you integrated the DW in the wiki creation job?  
16:29 <gdelhumeau> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10043  
16:29 <vmassol> ok thanks  
16:33 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
16:34 <vmassol> hmm creating a wiki from template doesn't work at all  
16:34 <gdelhumeau> wdym?  
16:34 <vmassol> It says "The wiki test2 has been successfully created. You can now access it." but there's no link and there's a spinning cog in front of " Checking Hibernate mapping and updating schema if needed for wiki [test2]"  
16:34 <vmassol> and it's not moving  
16:36 <gdelhumeau> have you refresh your browser's cache?  
16:36 <gdelhumeau> maybe you have the old js  
16:36 <vmassol> yes probably  
16:36 <vmassol> there's still a bug  
16:36 <vmassol> the message that it's ready seems to be displayed first  
16:36 <vmassol> no?  
16:37 <vmassol> retrying  
16:37 <lucaa1> has quit  
16:37 <vmassol> so good news is that the AS works too :)  
16:38 <vmassol> ah no forget it, the mesage is correctly displayed at the ed  
16:38 <vmassol> it was a js issue  
16:38 <vmassol> so all is working, nice :)  
16:38 <vmassol> closing the issue  
16:38 <vmassol> see tmortagne, you shouldn't despair!  
16:39 <gdelhumeau> I am proud to say that I've made a clean integration test for this :)  
16:39 <gdelhumeau> (for the wiki creation wizard)  
16:39 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: nice  
16:40 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: doesn't say so here: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10043  
16:42 <gdelhumeau> I've updated the existing tests actually  
16:42 <vmassol> tmortagne: I get this in the logs though when I edited the sandbox pages on the subwikis: https://gist.github.com/vmassol/06ef2e9eb3bfa3f512f6  
16:42 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: when we close issues we have the ability to say if there are unit and/or integrartion tests for it  
16:42 <vmassol> you should fill that as much as possible  
16:46 <vmassol> reporting  
16:46 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11872  
16:48 <tmortagne> (mflorea: tell me when you are done with the release note, I have XCOMMONS-711 to add)  
16:59 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
17:01 <mflorea> tmortagne, if xwiki.org would work..  
17:02 <mflorea> vmassol: anything to document about XWIKI-11795? (shows on the list of undocumented issues)  
17:04 <mflorea> tmortagne: done for the RM  
17:04 <vmassol> mflorea: I've put N/A (I guess I wanted to check how good the doc was for message stream at the time but I don't have the time right now)  
17:04 <mflorea> ok, no  
17:04 <mflorea> pb  
17:06 <mflorea> tmortagne: XWIKI-11792 and XCOMMONS-758 appear undocumented but I've seen something related in the RN. Maybe you forgot to add the documentation links  
17:14 <tmortagne> mflorea: comment for you on http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9223  
17:19 <mflorea> tmortagne indeed, but it's more likely I wasn't aware of this XWikiPreferencesDocumentInitializer  
17:30 <tmortagne> vmassol: it's probably the same thing for XWIKI-11019 then  
17:57 <vmassol> tmortagne: checking XWIKI-11019
